resources.string: Optionally set the box number you wish to inventory.

Enter sample identification value here. 
Samples are stored in a table and can be 
deleted by long-pressing on the sample 
name.
Export Data as a flat CSV file or structured \nSQL file with this button. Data is removed \nfrom the database upon successful export.
Cleared data is permanently deleted from \nthe application and is unrecoverable.
